item.title: Using fzf to quick access my notes from the cli
item.description: I wanted to create a simple script to quickly access my notes from the command line. fzf is a great and flexible tool which can be used to fuzzy search in the given input, like the file names in my notes directory. I already use it to search in the command line history and in vim to open files with fzf.vim. In this post I will walk you through how I built my note script using fzf.
